headline: A Look At Block’s (XYZ) Valuation After AI Driven Restructuring And 2026 Outlook Upgrade
summary: Block (XYZ) has moved to the center of investor attention after unveiling plans to cut its workforce by more than 40%, pairing this AI driven restructuring with upgraded 2026 guidance and a sharp share price reaction. See our latest analysis for Block. The restructuring news and upgraded 2026 outlook have come after a weak stretch for holders, with the 1 year total shareholder return at about 2.5% and the 5 year total shareholder return around 70% lower. Recent momentum has flipped sharply...

headline: The Week the Dreaded AI Jobs Wipeout Got Real
summary: After Block CEO Jack Dorsey announced his fintech firm was laying off 4,000 people, concerns rose that other companies would follow suit and aggressively cut jobs.
